title: Do I even deserved to be banned for 14 days?
body:
I was going Hecarim jungle and enemy team started flaming me cuz i didnt want to use predator runes and i had a feeding bot + top.. I don't even know why i should be banned for this bs.
CommetHD: inv?
CommetHD: didnt like pre
CommetHD: all about that dmg
CommetHD: predator is bad
CommetHD: and btw ezreal reported
CommetHD: Maybe if you read my side runes
CommetHD: My side runes is all speed
CommetHD: its fine kozu
CommetHD: sry
CommetHD: mb
CommetHD: aight
CommetHD: wait for fortune?
CommetHD: ap
CommetHD: ad ezreal broken
CommetHD: lol this noob azir
CommetHD: sry kozu
CommetHD: did i make u miss ur ult?
CommetHD: oh i thought that was
CommetHD: ._.
CommetHD: this kled
CommetHD: this kled
CommetHD: ults for no reason
CommetHD: wtf is wrong with u
CommetHD: azir is that no skill champ who needs people to do dmg for him
CommetHD: that ult from leona
CommetHD: fortune what are u talking about
CommetHD: ur legit 0/2
CommetHD: i never ganked bot ._>
CommetHD: that was when sona anad fortune wasnt there
CommetHD: its not called gank
CommetHD: embarrassed to be shutdown by a sup
CommetHD: im not gonna mute them
CommetHD: just so i can see how toxic and so i can report
CommetHD: lol fortune
CommetHD: all u did was ks
CommetHD: u ksed the gnar
CommetHD: and my passive burns with ignite
CommetHD: so stfu
CommetHD: reported
CommetHD: wood division
CommetHD: go play ur practice tool
CommetHD: yes u can
CommetHD: voted yes
CommetHD: Reported for sexual harraestment.
CommetHD: why are u gonna report your boy friend
CommetHD: ez
